Journey into Freedom
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK 'Procession of the Nobles' from 'Mlada' - Rimsky Korsakov arr. Ashmore: 1 SWEB Camborne, 90 2 St Dennis, 89 3 Bodmin, 87
Best Player: Andrew Turner, Eb Bass, St Dennis
Best Soprano: Mark Gundry, St. Dennis Best Solo Cornet: Aaron Harvey, Bodmin Best Euphonium: Dale Price, St. Dennis Best Solo Horn: Wayne Cook, St. Dennis Best Set of Basses: St. Dennis
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Judith Nicholas, David Matthews
